name: Fidget Spinner Twisty Blocks
description:
Fidget Spinner Twisty Blocks is an amazing neon graphics glowing game with tricky obstacles and energetic sounds. "Fidget Spinner Twisty Blocks" is not just a moving and avoiding obstacles game it holds you for its amazing graphics and smooth moves and screen shakes along with lovely particles which not only enhance the game beauty but also boost your desire to play it again and again and score more and more with a lot of heart smash and dash through beautifully animated obstacles.

HOW TO PLAY: “Fidget Spinner Twisty Blocks”:

Fidget Spinner Twisty Blocks is designed for its players to play long with ease and without being fed up of so many controls. You have to simply tap the screen to make your fidget spinner spin up and avoid being fell down to crash. Tap enough to hold and spin upward your fidget spinner avoiding obstacles smash. More you go up more you feel crazy in this super Fidget Spinner game.

Trick to Play Fidget Spinner Twisty Blocks:

No one tells the cheats but here we show you the hidden logic to hand on the game play. Just follow the collectible heart's line avoiding the twisting and switching obstacles to merge with your fidget spinner by tapping enough on the screen to hold your fidget spinner spins and stay.

Types of Fidget Spinners:

We offer you to select and play with your favorite fidget spinner having different neon effects.

1. Smart alien Ship fidget spinner
2. Perfect red and neon tipped fidget spinner
3. Strong Ninja blade fidget spinner
4. Super Triangle fidget spinner
5. Cool super hero look alike neon fidget spinner

Enjoy twist and spin with cool fidget spinners to cross glow hurdles twist.
